title: What is the need of music in arts education? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music is intangible. It is like the air we breathe or the sun we feel on our faces. Because it is intangible, we cannot own it like a work of graphic art. We can own a means of producing it, like a CD - although in the age of streaming even that is harder. Unless it is sung, which puts it in a whole different category, it is not dependent on words which can be distorted and used as weaponry. People can make music together who share not one word of each others’ languages.
